@Gerisch07 @Kayluvsredwings I agree with you that analytics is important, but you can't look at these stats without considering QOC and DZ%

@CConway96 advanced stats definitely isn't everything, but when someone is that bad, it's evident that he's having unfavourable deployment
@CConway96 well for starters, his corsi is at about 44% which is indicative of where the play is happening when he's on the ice
@CConway96 oh I agree with you in that he's not as bad as described, but he provides the least value in terms of salary to performance ratio
@CConway96 goal differential is the net sum of all goals scored whereas +/- doesn't take into account PP goals against Not the best argument
